pkgmetadata.longdescription: # ta-core[![pip version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/ta-core.svg)](https://pypi.python.org/pypi/ta-core)Thoughtful Automation Core package. This package contains the function required for Thoughtful Automation bots. Documentation may be closed and certain functions may not work outside the Thoughtful Automation environment.Example Usage-------------To use `Status` you need to install the library `rpaframework` and get WorkItems from `robocorp` environment. from ta_core.status import Status Status.change_status_to_warning()
